name: Too Many Packages!
description:
Hello, I present to you the best game I've made (at the time this was uploaded) but possibly the worst game in history!

..Seriously, literally all you do is pick up 3 packages and deliver it, this is mainly for my friends to check out. But feel free to download if you want.

If you have any complaints, hit me up on Discord (irscy  #3866)
